code: import{editText}from"./editText";import{EDIT_TODO,REMOVE_EDITID}from"./utils";function editreducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:editText;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case EDIT_TODO:{var id=action.payload.id;return state=id;}case REMOVE_EDITID:{return state="";}default:return state;}}export default editreducer;
